view

Interface ViewControllerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainController

    public interface ViewControllerListener
    The view controller listener functions to decouple and enable message passing between MV-CoDA's main controller and its view controller. The main controller implements this interface and so calls from the view controller use this interface.
    Author:
    tony

    • Method Summary

      Adds a playlist entry to the observable list in the gui

    • Method Detail

      • addPlaylistEntry

        void addPlaylistEntry()
                      throws MediaOpenException
        Adds a playlist entry to the observable list in the gui
        Throws:
        MediaOpenException - if the video associated with the playlist entry can't be opened

      • deletePlaylistEntry

        void deletePlaylistEntry()
        Deletes a playlist entry from the observable list in the GUI

      • moveUp

        void moveUp()
        Moves a playlist entry up in terms of both chart position, position in obervable list, and onscreen

        void moveDown()
        Moves a playlist entry down in terms of both chart position, position in obervable list, and onscreen

      • clearPlaylistEntries

        void clearPlaylistEntries()
        Clear a playlist entry in terms of both chart position, position in obervable list, and onscreen

      • loadPlaylist

        void loadPlaylist()
                  throws IOException,
                         MediaOpenException
        Loads a new playlist from file to both observable list, and onscreen. Also validates each entry and the themes and fonts selected
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the XML cannot be accessed
        IOException - if there is a problem with themes
        MediaOpenException - if the media associated with a playlist entry cannot be found or read

      • savePlaylist

        void savePlaylist()
                  throws FileNotFoundException,
                         IOException
        Saves the currently displayed playlist to XML file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem accessing the output files
        FileNotFoundException

      • render

        void render()
            throws IOException,
                   MediaOpenException,
                   NullPointerException,
                   GFXElementException
        Validates and then calls the engine to render a GFX composite output file from the selected playlist options displayed in the GUI
        Throws:
        IOException - a problem accessing input or output files needed for the operation
        MediaOpenException - if there are problems with any playlist entries' related music videos, or those videos do not agree on the output format
        NullPointerException - a theme has not been selected
        GFXElementException - if there is a problem with the GFX Element's files

      • getPlaylist

        Playlist getPlaylist()
        returns a playlist, for use in communcation between controllers
        Returns:
        a playlist
